title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a simple CLI and REST API for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. on macOS, Linux, Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: sync/async clients, streaming, chat & embed endpoints.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; npm package ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer adding Ollama chat, embed, and tool-calling support.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed ‘Open WebUI’).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting and chat history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS-Code extension using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU/node-selector support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset for using Ollama generators & embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library (Maven Central) for Ollama with fluent API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for Ollama chat & completion endpoints.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ with async streaming.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM summarization & Q&A on your vault.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama with thread-aware conversations.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision Ollama on AWS EC2 with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + ChromaDB + LangChain.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Community-curated Modelfile recipes for 100+ models (CodeLlama, Solar, Zephyr, etc.).

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for announcements, troubleshooting and model sharing.
